about_the_game:
TD Tactics is a combination of the Tower Defense and Auto Battler genres, with a focus on real time strategy and resource management. You will encounter different types of units and bosses. Build towers, cast spells and manage your gold effectively to defend against challenging waves of enemies.



  • Economy Management: Each turn, random towers and spells appear in the shop according to your level. Use gold to buy towers and spells, gain interest, and level up. Proper economy management is crucial for building a strong defense.
  • Combining Towers: Collecting three identical towers upgrades them to a higher-tier version, increasing their stats and abilities. For example, three one-star towers combine into a two-star tower. Just like in the classic Auto Chess games.
  • Classes and Synergies: Each tower has a specific class. Placing towers with matching classes activates synergies, providing powerful bonuses to the your defenses.
  • Leveling Up: Gain XP by spending gold and defeating waves. Leveling up increases your unit cap and allows you to place more towers on the board. As your level increases, you draw more powerful spells and towers.

Features


  • 2 Types of Terrains - Each terrain has 5+ maps with different challenges.
  • 13+ Towers - Each tower has three upgrades.
  • Different enemy types.
  • Auto Chess like game loop.
